author: Lydia Smith
title: Germany To Introduce Coronavirus 'Immunity Certificates' For Recovered Public
description: The documents are part of a research project being conducted at the Helmholtz Centre for Infection Research in Braunschweig, which will conduct blood tests in the general public for antibodies produced against the virus.
content:
German researchers are planning to introduce coronavirus "immunity certificates" to indicate who has recovered from the virus and is ready to re-enter society.
The documents are part of a research project being conducted at the Helmholtz Centre for Infection… [+2097 chars]
